name: Ext_R3_SampledData_period
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.SampledData.period for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents SampledData.period from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SampledData|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The length of time between sampling times, measured in milliseconds.
element.comment: `SampledData.period` maps to R5 `SampledData.interval`. To multiple elements in SampledData: (`SampledData.interval`, `SampledData.intervalUnit`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `SampledData.period` maps to R5 `SampledData.intervalUnit`. To multiple elements in SampledData: (`SampledData.interval`, `SampledData.intervalUnit`). Has no type mapping `intervalUnit` added a required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ucum-units|5.0.0`. So is mapped as RelatedTo.

element.definition: The length of time between sampling times, measured in milliseconds.
element.comment: `SampledData.period` maps to R5 `SampledData.interval`. To multiple elements in SampledData: (`SampledData.interval`, `SampledData.intervalUnit`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `SampledData.period` maps to R5 `SampledData.intervalUnit`. To multiple elements in SampledData: (`SampledData.interval`, `SampledData.intervalUnit`). Has no type mapping `intervalUnit` added a required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ucum-units|5.0.0`. So is mapped as RelatedTo.
